title: The Supreme Court decision in Plessy v. Ferguso...

content.question: The Supreme Court decision in Plessy v. Ferguson (1896) did which of the following?

choices.label: Denounced business combinations in restraint of trade.
Sanctioned separate but equal public facilities for African Americans.
Declared that the Fourteenth Amendment applied principally to the protection of corporations.
Empowered Congress to cancel treaties with American Indian tribes unilaterally.

content.answer: Sanctioned separate but equal public facilities for African Americans.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
